diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Disseminated histoplasmosis with central nervous system and prostatic involvement
diagnosis.differential_diagnosis: Hemorrhagic metastasis of melanoma, leukemic deposits, intracranial neoplasm, toxoplasmosis, other infectious processes
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: Final diagnosis was confirmed through serological testing for H. capsulatum, blood and urine cultures, and pathological analysis revealing necrotizing granulomas with intralesional fungal organisms. MRI showed multiple ring-enhancing lesions consistent with disseminated histoplasmosis.
